docs.snippet: A special election in what had been a safe G.O.P. district is now a close race, in part because of Trump voters who are now disappointed in his presidency.

headline.print_headline: At Heart of Tight Race, Folks Who Picked Trump But Wish They Hadn’t
headline.main: House Race in Pennsylvania May Turn on Trump Voters’ Regrets

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump on Tuesday said the United States is subsidizing Amazon.com Inc and that the online retailer must pay more to ship its products through the nation's postal agency.

headline.print_headline: Trump Says U.S. Subsidizes Amazon for Shipping
headline.main: Trump Says U.S. Subsidizes Amazon for Shipping

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump criticized the major television networks on Tuesday as "fakers."

headline.print_headline: Trump Blasts News Media as 'Fakers', Defends Sinclair
headline.main: Trump Blasts News Media as 'Fakers', Defends Sinclair

docs.snippet: Asserting the situation had reached "a point of crisis," President Donald Trump on Wednesday signed a proclamation directing the deployment of the National Guard to the U.S.-Mexico border to fight illegal immigration.

headline.print_headline: Trump Signs Proclamation Directing Troops to Secure Border
headline.main: Trump Signs Proclamation Directing Troops to Secure Border

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he planned to use U.S. military forces to protect the nation's southern border with Mexico until there is a border wall and "proper security."

headline.print_headline: Trump Says Will Use Military to Protect U.S. Border
headline.main: Trump Says Will Use Military to Protect U.S. Border

docs.snippet: He’s right that we have a real trade problem with China. But he’s wrong about what to do about it.

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Right About China, To a Point
headline.main: Some Things Are True Even if Trump Believes Them

docs.snippet: A state judge has ruled that Summer Zervos, who accused Mr. Trump of groping her, can sue him for defamation for calling her a liar.

headline.main: President Trump Must Face Accusations of ‘Apprentice’ Contestant
